-- Noir --

Noir also shimmers into view, just off of Devilcat's right side. She 
also nods, then just watches Hydras.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "As you wish," Devilcat agrees, "but first ... show yourselves, 
> girls."  He's referring, of course, to Gatara and Noir.  It's a 
> simple way for him to tell his followers he wants to keep an ace 
up 
> the proverbial sleeve by leaving two members of the party cloaked.
> 
> Gatara shimmers into reality, nodding to acknowledge Hydras.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> > Hydras smirked and walked down the ramp. He greeted devilcat 
with a 
> bow. 
> > "Come into my base and we can discuss it on the bridge."
